Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir

package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir
The V2 to FHIR package contains the core code for the IZ Gateway Transformation Service components that perform conversion of HL7 V2 Immunization Messages written according to the CDC HL7 Version 2.5.1 Implementation Guide for Immunization Messaging to HL7 FHIR Resources conforming to FHIR R4, FHIR US Core V7.0.0, USCDI V4 and the HL7 Version 2 to FHIR Implementation Guide from the January 2024 STU Ballot. The converter package has everything a user needs to convert HL7 messages and components parsed using the HAPI V2 library into FHIR Resources. The segment package contains parsers for HL7 V2 message segments. The datatype package contains parsers for HL7 V2 datatypes. The utils package contains a variety of utility classes useful during the conversion process.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry
See Also:

  • Github
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.annotation
     
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.converter
    The converter package contains classes for parsing and converting HL7 V2 messages, segments and datatypes into FHIR Bundles, Resources and datatypes respectively.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.datatype
    This package contains the definition of a DatatypeParser interface, and datatype parsers for more complex datatypes, such as Address, ContactPoint and HumanName.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment
    This package contains the definition for parsers that parse HL7 V2 Groups and Segments defined for the various types of HL7 Messages.
    gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils
    This package contains utility classes for performing V2 to FHIR Conversions.
